original: 佔據水域、搶劫商船或居民的水賊，手持劣等長槍，對騎兵有加成，擅長水性。以財物為目標，是只求在亂世中生存的投機份子。
text: Water pirates who occupy waters and rob merchant ships or residents, armed with inferior long spears, have a bonus to cavalry, and are good at water. Targeting property is a speculator who only seeks to survive in troubled times.
